Text:
I think what he meant is "Thank You"!

@UAofE If you want it uncensored, shell out a few bucks when the blu-ray comes out... aw, who am I kidding, you'll probably just be back here for the BD-rips and complain about something else.

@Dwch: he has a right to complain about bullshit censorship when it's completely uncensored on TV.

retarded idiots at AMC and the entire music industry always feel the need to censor "strong language" despite the fact that kids in today's world have dirtier mouths than a crack whore sucking 10 cocks a day for money.

censorship is useless and unnecessary, it should be the parents' responsibility for supervising what their children can or cannot watch. let's not kid ourselves, we knew about sex, drugs, violence etc. way before we hit the drinking age. 

tv and music censorship's goal to create a clean and serene environment for our kids is impossible to achieve in today's world.

and you're the biggest hypocrite on here for calling UAofE a pirate while commenting on piratebay. lmao moron
Exactly, you're watching a show about making methamphetamine plus you just witnessed a 12 year old child get murdered and dissolved in acid.
you stupid fuck thank you for the fucking spoiler. go fuck your self and then ruin another show for someone else. ps go fuck your mom while your at it

It wasn't much of a spoiler, and it was expected. What else could it have been?

And why do these always have to be so quiet? I have my speakers cranked up and hope I don't get an email notification. Probably it's unmodified, but I don't have to like it.

I do like the episode though, and I'm happy to see it :)

It wasn't a spoiler, you moron. The guy was told "no witnesses" and the child was shot at the end of the last episode, did you expect he would be nursed back to health and make a full recovery?
This is not the first child to have been murdered on the show.

Came here to thank the uploader for these great web-dls. The picture quality is the best out there.

Also, fuck YOU, UAofE. You could've made your point without including the minor spoiler. Thoughtless cunt.
Damn censored, I guess I'll just go with the HDTV Rip instead then...  Regardless, Thanks Dibya for all your torrents :D
